alert.note: Alert for Fergus (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 05 at 3:57PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fergus County through 415 PM MDT... At 356 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles east of Lewistown, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph, nickel size hail, and very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Giltedge. This includes Highway 200 between mile markers 93 and 105. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM MDT for central Montana.
